Capsule8 is building the industryâ€™s only real-time attack disruption platform purpose built for the cloud-native world of Linux, containers and microservices. Capsule8 automates the detection, isolation, and shut down of attacks in the instant they happen.

The position is on the app team; we're building the business logic server and user-facing frontend. The server is Typescript/Postgres (REST over HTTP(2) + WS) and the frontend is Typescript/React.

I lead the app team; email me at phil@capsule8.com if you'd like to chat!
